DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Identify tumor antigen induce humoral response patient cancer . - Identify tumor-secreted protein special analysis culture , evaluate expression pattern tumor preneoplastic lesion assess potential specificity . - Determine serum positivity specificity potential marker early detection cancer . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients healthy participant undergo blood collection . Patients suspect newly diagnose disease undergo second blood collection 4-10 week surgery ( additional cytotoxic therapy radiotherapy ) provide surgical resection negative margin . All patient ask question family history cancer , development cancer , medical history , past present smoking history , menstrual period female . DNA extract blood patient tumor tissue sample obtain surgery . Immunohistochemistry ( include polymerase chain reaction ) situ hybridization use analyze protein expression pattern , protein identify mass spectrometry amino acid sequence . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 3,150 patient 1,200 healthy participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion ( patient ) : Scheduled undergo primary surgical resection first debulking surgery ( prior anticancer treatment ) suspect newly diagnose cancer , include follow type : Breast cancer Adenocarcinoma colon Adenocarcinoma squamous cell carcinoma esophagus Nonsmall cell lung cancer Ovarian epithelial adenocarcinoma Metastatic unresectable cancer , include follow type : Breast cancer Adenocarcinoma colon Adenocarcinoma squamous cell carcinoma esophagus Hepatoma Nonsmall cell lung cancer Small cell lung cancer Ovarian epithelial adenocarcinoma Adenocarcinoma pancreas Meets follow criterion ( healthy participant ) : No chronic disease Healthy participants history cancer must cancerfree 5 year ( skin cancer carcinoma situ cervix within past 5 year allow ) Willing provide 60 mL blood Not blood relative eligible consent cancer patient PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Able tolerate removal 3060 mL blood No feeling lightheadedness , dizziness , faint within past 2 week Pulse le 100 day blood draw study enrollment PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics At least 3 week since prior chemotherapy radiotherapy metastatic unresectable cancer No concurrent chemotherapy No concurrent radiotherapy
